short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Extension that helps SamaCare's users to submit prior authorizations on external portals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A better way to capture and manage all your portal Prior Authorizations within SamaCare.

- Streamline workflows and save time.
- You're just one-click away from submitting new prior authorizations and status updates.
- Works on any healthcare portal.
- Easy to Use. The CoPilot Browser Button will conveniently show-up as you browse to well-known portals on the web. 
- Available in Chrome Web Store and free to install.

Interested in using CoPilot? Get a SamaCare demo at https://www.samacare.com/contact-us.
By installing, you are agree with the Terms of Use located at https://www.samacare.com/privacy-policy.
